title: GT 4.0 WS MDS Trigger Service: User's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The WS MDS Trigger Service collects information about Grid resources and can be configured to execute a program if the collected data meets certain conditions.

section.title: Troubleshooting
section.para: The Trigger Service does not have any end-user clients. General troubleshooting information can be found in the GT 4.0 Java WS Core User's Guide.
